title: For Teachers
description: Learn show Skole can help teachers to boost the performance of their students.
ctaHeader: Boost the performance of your students for free! Get anonymous feedback! No strings attached. Contact us to get started!
studentsBullet1: - By having low threshold, anonymous discussions with their peers.
studentsBullet2: - Your students can join without registration. We will handle the moderation for you!
teachersBullet1: - By getting anonymous feedback from the students. The feedback is sent directly to your email and is not saved by us.
teachersBullet2: - By activating students through the score system that rewards them for their activity.
infoBullet1: 1. Contact us and tell us which courses or materials would you like your students to interact with.
infoBullet2: 2. Send us your material and we will upload it for you! We always clearly credit you as the author.
